steps.title: Draw the number in lead pencil first.
steps.content: Draw the number in lead pencil first. For the purposes of this demonstration article, we have chosen an 8. Use rounded drawing at all times, even with numbers that have straighter edges. Think of ballooning as you move the pencil around corners.

steps.title: Outline the number with a marker.
steps.content: Outline the number with a marker. Keep the outline rounded.

steps.title: Color in the bubble number.
steps.content: Color in the bubble number. It is ready now, or you can embellish as explained in the next step.

steps.title: Experiment with different colors and patterns.
steps.content: Experiment with different colors and patterns. Make the bubble numbers more interesting and elaborate by adding different designs to them, such as rainbow shading, spots, lines, small shapes etc.
